title: Emerald Cascade: Diamond & Emerald Statement Haaram
features: Modern cascading design with floral diamond clusters and emerald accents. The emeralds are bezel set, enhancing their color. Features a delicate gold chain for comfortable wear. Perfect fusion of traditional Haaram silhouette with contemporary diamond & gemstone arrangement.
description: This exquisite haaram blends the timeless beauty of emeralds with the brilliance of diamonds in a modern design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine. The design provides a fresh take on the traditional haaram, making it a perfect heirloom piece for the modern woman.
